SELECT t.* FROM ( select ap.id AS "id", ap.work_no AS "workNo", ap.name AS "name", (CASE WHEN ap.gender = '1' THEN '男' WHEN ap.gender = '0' THEN '女' ELSE '' END) AS "gender", ap.contact_tel AS "contactTel", ap.dept_id AS "deptId", ad.dept_num AS "deptNum", ad.dept_name AS "deptName", ap.id_no AS "idNo", ap.type AS "type", case ap.type when '01' then '本院职工' when '02' then '外协单位员工' when '03' then '医院返聘职工' when '04' then '科室返聘职工' when '05' then '进修医生' when '06' then '进修护士' when '07' then '实习医生' when '08' then '实习护士' when '09' then '研究生' when '10' then '临时医技人员' when '11' then '规范会培训生' when '12' then '院聘临时工' when '13' then '科聘临时工' when '99' then '其他人员"' end as"staffType", (CASE WHEN ap.is_service = '1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS "isService", ap.status AS "status", (CASE WHEN ap.status = '1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS "isStatus" from $projectSchema$.ac_personnel ap LEFT JOIN $projectSchema$.ac_department ad ON ad.id = ap.dept_id ) t WHERE 1=1 and t.status = '1'
t.id = #userId#
t.workNo = #workNo1#
t.workNo like concat('%',#workNo#,'%')
t.name like concat('%',#userName#,'%')
t.deptId = #deptId#
t.deptNum like concat('%',#deptNum#,'%')
t.deptName like concat('%',#deptName#,'%')
t.deptId in (select id from $projectSchema$.ac_department where hospital_district = #datagroupCode#)
